questions.question: কোন ভাষার নিজস্ব লিপি নেই?

questions.question: উপসর্গ কোনটি?

questions.question: ‘স্বাধীনতা হীনতায় কে বাঁচিতে চায়' কার লেখা?

questions.question: He said to me, "where were you born?" The correct indirect speech of the sentence is :

options.label: ক
options.text: He told me where I were born.

options.label: খ
options.text: He asked me where I was born.

options.label: গ
options.text: He asked me where I had been born.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He asked me where I had born.

questions.option_a: He told me where I were born.
questions.option_b: He asked me where I was born.
questions.option_c: He asked me where I had been born.
questions.option_d: He asked me where I had born.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: গ) He asked me where I had been born. Direct speech টা হলো: "He said to me, 'Where were you born?'" এটাকে indirect speech-এ change করতে হলে: Reporting verb ( said to me ) changes to asked me । Pronoun ( you ) changes to I । Verb ( were born ) changes to had been born (past perfect tense)। তাই, correct indirect speech টা হবে: "He asked me where I had been born." (সে আমাকে জিজ্ঞাসা করল যে আমি কোথায় জন্মগ্রহণ করেছিলাম।) Other options ভুল কারণ: Option ক) "He told me where I were born." - এখানে "told" এবং "were" ভুল, কারণ reporting verb asked এবং past perfect tense ( had been born ) use করতে হয়। Option খ) "He asked me where I was born." - এখানে "was born" past simple tense, কিন্তু indirect speech-এ past perfect tense ( had been born ) use করতে হয়। Option ঘ) "He asked me where I had born." - এখানে "had born" ভুল, কারণ সঠিক form হলো "had been born" । So, the correct answer is option গ।

questions.question: pH is an abbreviation for?
questions.explanation: সঠিক উত্তর: ক) Power of Hydrogen ব্যাখ্যা: pH হলো একটি রসায়নগত সূচক যা দ্রবণের অম্লতা বা ক্ষারত্ব পরিমাপ করে। এটি Power of Hydrogen এর সংক্ষিপ্ত রূপ, যেখানে H⁺ আয়নের ঘনত্বকে ব্যবহার করে মান নির্ধারণ করা হয়।
